creditline: Gift of Elizabeth, Julie, and Catherine Andrus in memory of John and Marion Andrus
description: image of an empty wine glass standing on small, heavily shaded plate with scalloped edge
marks:
Signature

in graphite on recto, at bottom: [2 5 signed in plate, lower left: [Whistler]
provenance: [C. & J. Goodfriend, New York, until February 13, 1986; sold to Andrus]; John E. Andrus III, Wayzata, Minn.; by descent to his daughters, Elizabeth, Katie, and Julie. Earlier provenances have been gathered, but further research will increase our knowledge of their histories.
title: The Wine Glass
